law.catch_line: The following moneys shall be considered general funds of the State:...

text.section:
The following moneys shall be considered general funds of the State:
except as provided under § 6-107 of this article, revenue received under Title 6, Subtitle 1 of this article;
all revenue received under §§ 3-324, 4-209, 6-303, and 6-304 of this article; and
all penalties imposed by the Commissioner, including the following penalties imposed under:
§§ 4-113(d), 4-212, 10-126(c), 11-232, 14-140, 23-208, 23-506, 26-502, 27-305, and 27-408 of this article; and
§ 19-730 of the Health - General Article.
